main event: A civilian observed one round, white object in the sky for approximately 3-4 minutes.
interesting points: The object was the size of a quarter,The sighting lasted for 3-4 minutes and was still in sight at the time of the initial report,Comments speculated the object could be an astronomical body or atmospheric conditions,The case was evaluated as probably astronomical, specifically identified as Capella,The report was part of the Project Blue Book study of UFOs.
